column4: hi, is there a terminal command represent th "aktivate/deaktivate wirless lan" funktion in the nm-applet?
I think it is equivalent to ifconfig device up/down
but if i use ifconfig ath0 down, the wlan doesnt deaktivate the signal goesdown to 30 %
but if i use ifconfig ath0 down, the wlan doesnt deaktivate the signal goesdown to 30 %, and to reaktivet it i musst use the nm applet
